phases.title: Extend detailStore for Tiki releases
phases.objective: Add state management for Tiki release selection with mutual exclusivity across issue/GitHub release/Tiki release selections
tasks: Add selectedTikiRelease: string | null to DetailState interface
Add setSelectedTikiRelease action to DetailActions interface
Implement setSelectedTikiRelease to set Tiki release and clear issue + GitHub release
Update clearSelection to also clear selectedTikiRelease
phases.verification: TypeScript compiles without errors. Store exports selectedTikiRelease and setSelectedTikiRelease. Selecting Tiki release clears other selections.

phases.title: Create TikiReleaseDetail component

tasks: Create TikiReleaseDetail component accepting TikiRelease and onEdit callback props
Implement header section with version, name, and status badge
Create status badge mapping for active, completed, shipped, not_planned statuses
Add actions section with Edit, Run Release, and Review Release buttons
Implement Run Release button to invoke write_terminal with /tiki:release {version}
Implement Review Release button for dry-run preview
Add issues section listing all issues with numbers and titles
Add metadata section showing createdAt and updatedAt with formatRelativeTime
Export TikiReleaseDetail from index.ts
phases.verification: Component renders without errors. Action buttons are visible and properly styled. Edit button triggers callback.

phases.title: Update ReleasesSection click handler

tasks: Import setSelectedTikiRelease from useDetailStore
Modify handleTikiReleaseClick to call setSelectedTikiRelease(release.version) instead of opening modal
Keep handleAddClick unchanged for creating new releases
phases.verification: Clicking Tiki release updates detailStore.selectedTikiRelease instead of opening modal. Add button still opens modal.
